etymology.description: 工(工) (gōng, "work") + 程(程) (chéng, "process") + 师(師) (shī, "expert") = engineer
etymology.interpretation: An engineer is someone who is an expert 师(師) (shī, "expert") in the process 程(程) (chéng, "process") of work 工(工) (gōng, "work").

examples.chinese: 他是一名优秀的工程师(他是一名優秀的工程師)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yī míng yōuxiù de gōngchéngshī.

examples.chinese: 工程师设计建筑(工程師設計建築)，创造未来(創造未來)。
examples.english: Engineers design buildings, creating the future.

examples.chinese: 许多人梦想成为工程师(許多人夢想成為工程師)。
examples.english: Many people dream of becoming an engineer.
